oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lecture - Peter Guralnick - 2007-04-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Peter Guralnick lecture from the Ford Theater of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 19, 2007. Companion to the Ray Charles exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Peter Guralnick
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cosmic Ray: Peter Guralnick's lecture on the origins of Ray Charles' recording of "I Got A Woman"
